item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 12:30 PM UTC
item.description:

8. Hazel: A live functional programming environment featuring typed holes (182 points | 49 comments)

15. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
16. A conserved fertilization complex bridges sperm and egg in vertebrates (26 points | 5 comments)

28. Five or ten new proofs of the Pythagorean Theorem (97 points | 44 comments)
29. Everyone is wrong about that Slack flowchart (132 points | 57 comments)
30. Suits, money laundering, and linear programming (52 points | 13 comments)
